[quote name="donmuth" post=2106505]You were the guy who beat me to the Meyer Old Mill?!  I gotta get faster...[/QUOTE]

The texting aspect was absolutely key to the transaction. I was on my lunch, checked net54.  Brett just posted the thread; it had 3 views when I went in. I inquired about another card and it was sold, believe it or not. The texting , I’ll tell you, really made the transactions smooth and quick.
